title: Unsatisfied precondition moving into a closure that is immediately called
body:
```
fn main() {                                                                                                                                                    
    let x = 1;                                                                                                                                                 
    let y = fn@[move x]() -> int {                                                                                                                             
        x                                                                                                                                                      
    }();                                                                                                                                                       
}     
```

